casebody.data:
Ada L. James, Appellant v. James McCreery, Respondent. Decided April 14, 1890. Appeal from an order staying all proceedings on the part of the plaintiff until payment of the costs of an action brought by Edward F. J ames against the defendant. Edward F. James, for appellant. W. F. Dunning, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Dugro, J.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed with $10 costs and disbursements, to be taxed.
